author: Michael Holden
description: One of Britain's most notorious killers, "Moors murderer" Ian Brady, who murdered five children with his lover and accomplice Myra Hindley during a sadistic two-year reign of terror in the 1960s died on Monday.
title: Sadistic British child killer, 'Moors Murderer' Ian Brady, dies

author: Peter Gould
description: What was Ian Brady really like? Journalist Peter Gould gained a unique insight into the Moors Murder's mind through an extraordinary exchange of letters that lasted almost 30 years.
title: Ian Brady letters: Inside the mind of the Moors Murderer

description: Ian Brady, the Moors Murderer who has died aged 79, refused to reveal where he buried Keith Bennett as police tried to prise the secret from him as he lay dying.
title: Ian Brady dies: Police pleaded with Moors Murderer to reveal secrets as he lay dying

author: Samuel Osborne
description: Greater Manchester Police have said they will never close the case of Moors Murder victim Keith Bennett, despite the death of Ian Brady. Martin Bottomley, head of the force's Cold Case Review Unit, said officers would act on "credible and actionable" information which would help them find the body of 12-year-old Keith. He said: "Whilst we are not actively searching Saddleworth Moors, Greater Manchester Police will never close this case.
title: Police vow to never close Moor Murders case despite Ian Brady's death

author: Steve Robson, Stephen White
description: The Moors Murderer rejected suggestions that he had 'manipulated' Myra Hindley into carrying out their murderous spree
title: Ian Brady's confessions including how Myra was 'in tune' with him from the start

author: BBC News
description: The coroner at Ian Brady's inquest made the ruling after the Moors Murderer died on Monday.
title: Ian Brady's ashes 'not to be scattered at Saddleworth Moor'

author: Helen Pidd
description: At opening of inquest into child murdererâ€™s death, coroner says it would be offensive if ashes were taken to Saddleworth Moor
title: Ian Brady's ashes must not be scattered on moor, says coroner

author: BBC News
description: The coroner at Ian Brady's inquest made the ruling after the Moors Murderer died on Monday.
title: Ian Brady's ashes 'not to be scattered at Saddleworth Moor'

author: Stephen White
description: The Moors Murderer wanted a guard of honour and a gangland-style funeral, but he will be cremated in front of a handful of officials and his remains disposed of near Ashworth security hospital
title: Sick Ian Brady demanded his ashes be scattered on the Moors with his victims

author: Lucy Clarke-Billings
description: Leading violent crime psychologist claims the Moors Murderer believed to be forgotten "was a fate worse than death" thrived off public power games
title: Ian Brady 'died as he lived - in complete control' violent crime expert reveals
